00001 #include "FittedRmaxq.hh"

00003 namespace {
00006   const unsigned explorationthreshold = 5;
00007 
00009   const double maxval = 20.0;
00010 
00013   const double discountfactor = 1.0;
00014 
00018   const double epsilon = 0.01;
00019 
00025   const int resolutionfactor = 4;
00026 
00027   StatePredicateRef truep = TrueStatePredicate::create();
00028   StatePredicateRef falsep = FalseStatePredicate::create();
00029   StateFunctionRef zerof = ZeroStateFunction::create();
00030 
00031   StateVariables dimensions;
00032 } // end of anonymous namespace
00033 
00034 TaskRef get_task_hierarchy(taskspec_t *ts)
00035 {
00036   // Number of state variables
00037   const unsigned discrete_dim = getNumIntObs(ts);
00038   dimensions.clear();
00039   for (unsigned i = 0; i < discrete_dim; ++i)
00040     dimensions[i] = 1.0;
00041 
00042   const unsigned continuous_dim = getNumDoubleObs(ts);
00043   for (unsigned i = 0; i < continuous_dim; ++i) {
00044     const double max = getDoubleObsMax(ts, i);
00045     const double min = getDoubleObsMin(ts, i);
00046     dimensions[discrete_dim + i] = 1.0 / (max - min);
00047   }
00048 
00049   int firstaction = getIntActMin(ts, 0);
00050   int lastaction = getIntActMax(ts, 0);
00051   // Create primitive tasks.
00052   std::vector<TaskRef> primitives;
00053   for (int i = firstaction; i <= lastaction; ++i) {
00054     TaskRef task;
00055     if (continuous_dim > 0) {
00056       task = DiscretizedPrimitiveTask::create("",
00057                                               i,
00058                                               explorationthreshold,
00059                                               maxval,
00060                                               resolutionfactor,
00061                                               dimensions,
00062                                               truep);
00063     } else {
00064       DynamicAveragerRef model_averager = ProjectionAverager::create(dimensions);
00065       task = PrimitiveTask::create("",
00066                                    i,
00067                                    explorationthreshold,
00068                                    maxval,
00069                                    model_averager,
00070                                    truep);
00071     }
00072     primitives.push_back(task);
00073   }
00074 
00075   // Create root task
00076   AveragerRef value_averager = ProjectionAverager::create(dimensions);
00077   return CompositeTask::create("ROOT",
00078                                primitives.begin(),
00079                                primitives.end(),
00080                                truep,
00081                                falsep,
00082                                zerof,
00083                                value_averager,
00084                                discountfactor,
00085                                epsilon);
00086 }
